mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pf_members(id, pwd, name, email, tel, sms_yn, email_yn, type, provider) VALUES (#{id}, PASSWORD(#{password}), #{name}, #{email}, #{tel}, #{smsYN}, #{emailYN}, #{type}, #{provider})
mapper.select: SELECT member_no, type, id, name, email FROM pf_members WHERE (id=#{email} OR email=#{email}) AND pwd=password(#{password}) AND userkey='Y'
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM pf_members WHERE member_no = #{member_no} AND pwd=PASSWORD(#{pwd})
mapper.update: UPDATE pf_members SET pwd=password(#{newPassword}) WHERE member_no=#{memberNumber} AND pwd=PASSWORD(#{password}) email=#{email}
